name: Acoustic Guitar
description: A beautifully crafted acoustic guitar with a rich, warm tone.

faq.question: Is this guitar suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes, its dreadnought body and comfortable neck profile make it an excellent choice for beginners and intermediate players alike.

faq.question: Does it come with a case?
faq.answer: This model does not include a case, but we offer a variety of compatible gig bags and hard cases sold separately.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Experience immersive sound with these noise-cancelling wireless headphones.

reviews.comment: Absolutely phenomenal sound quality! The noise cancellation is top-notch. Worth every penny.
Great headphones, very comfortable for long sessions. Battery life is amazing. Only downside is the case feels a bit cheap.

faq.question: What is the battery life?
faq.answer: The headphones offer up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge with ANC off, and around 30 hours with ANC on.

faq.question: Are these headphones waterproof?
faq.answer: They are not fully waterproof but are rated IPX4 for sweat and water resistance, making them suitable for workouts.

faq.question: Can I connect to multiple devices at once?
faq.answer: Yes, these headphones support multi-point Bluetooth connection, allowing you to seamlessly switch between two devices.
